# Calimero Network

> Calimero Network is a framework which enables building fully decentralized applications, ensuring everyone's data privacy through peer-to-peer Self-Sovereign applications with verified off-chain computing.

Calimero Network provides a comprehensive development framework for building decentralized applications that prioritize data ownership and privacy. The framework uses WebAssembly (WASM) for secure application execution and provides a robust runtime environment for managing peer-to-peer networks.

## Introduction

- [What is Calimero](https://docs.calimero.network/01-introduction/01-what-is-calimero): Development framework for peer-to-peer Self-Sovereign applications
- [Use Cases](https://docs.calimero.network/01-introduction/02-use-cases): Applications and scenarios where Calimero Network can be utilized
- [Key Features](https://docs.calimero.network/01-introduction/03-key-features): Core capabilities including decentralized networks and WASM applications

## Getting Started

- [Setup](https://docs.calimero.network/02-getting-started/01-setup): Complete setup guide for Calimero Network
- [Packaged Installation](https://docs.calimero.network/02-getting-started/02-packaged): Quick installation using pre-built packages
- [Build From Source](https://docs.calimero.network/02-getting-started/03-build-from-source): Step-by-step guide to building from source
- [Run as a systemd service](https://docs.calimero.network/02-getting-started/04-run-as-systemd-service): Running Calimero node continuously on servers

## Core Concepts

- [Terminology](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/01-terminology): Essential vocabulary for Calimero Network architecture
- [Identity](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/03-identity): Decentralized identity framework for secure authentication
- [Contexts](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/04-context): Application-specific networks for direct communication
- [Applications](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/05-applications): Core logic governing peer interactions
- [Blockchain Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/06-blockchain-integration): Integration with existing blockchain networks
- [Encryption](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/07-encryption): Security features for data privacy
- [Specialized Nodes](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/08-specialized-nodes): Third-party nodes providing additional services
- [Node](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/_02-node): Node architecture and components
- [State Reconciliation](https://docs.calimero.network/03-core-concepts/_09-state-reconciliation): State synchronization mechanisms

## Architecture

- [System Overview](https://docs.calimero.network/04-architecture/01-system-overview): High-level architecture and design principles
- [Client Node](https://docs.calimero.network/04-architecture/03-node/01-client-node): Runtime environment and capabilities
- [Runtime](https://docs.calimero.network/04-architecture/03-node/02-runtime): Execution environment for applications
- [Server](https://docs.calimero.network/04-architecture/03-node/03-server): Server components for node interaction
- [Storage](https://docs.calimero.network/04-architecture/03-node/04-storage): Data management and storage capabilities
- [Network](https://docs.calimero.network/04-architecture/03-node/05-network): Networking components and peer-to-peer communication

## Developer Tools

- [Developer Tools Overview](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/00-overview): Tools for building decentralized applications
- [Merod](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/01-CLI/01-merod): Command-line tool for managing Calimero nodes
- [Meroctl](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/01-CLI/02-meroctl): Control utility for node operations
- [Protocol SDK](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/03-protocol-sdk/01-protocol-sdk): Foundation tools for building application logic
- [Rust Protocol SDK](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/03-protocol-sdk/02-protocol-rs-sdk): Essential macros and functions reference
- [Rust SDK Deep Dive](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/03-protocol-sdk/03-rust-sdk-deep-dive): Advanced usage of Calimero Rust SDK
- [Calimero Collections Reference](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/03-protocol-sdk/04-calimero-collections): Available collections in Calimero SDK
- [External Functions and Proposals](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/03-protocol-sdk/05-external-functions-and-proposals): External proposal system for blockchain interactions
- [TypeScript Client SDK](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/04-client-sdk/calimero-client-js): TypeScript SDK for user interfaces
- [Python Client SDK](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/04-client-sdk/calimero-client-py): High-performance Python client library
- [Client SDKs](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/02-SDK/04-client-sdk): Client SDKs for different languages
- [Admin Dashboard](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/03-apps/05-admin-dashboard): Web-based interface for node management
- [Desktop App](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/03-apps/06-desktop-app): Desktop application for managing nodes
- [Admin API Reference](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/04-admin-api): Programmatic access to node management
- [ABI Generation](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/abi-generation): Automatic generation of Application Binary Interfaces
- [ABI Configuration](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/abi-generation/02-configuration): Configuration options for ABI generation
- [ABI Build Process](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/abi-generation/build-process): How ABI generation works

## Merobox CLI Tool

- [Merobox Overview](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox): CLI tool for managing Calimero nodes and workflows
- [Installation and Setup](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/installation): Complete guide to installing Merobox CLI
- [Node Management](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/node-management): Managing Calimero nodes with Merobox
- [Network Configuration](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/network-configuration): Network configuration and port management
- [Advanced Configuration](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/advanced-configuration): Advanced features and configuration options
- [Workflow System](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/workflows): Creating and managing workflows with YAML
- [Advanced Examples](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/advanced-examples): Complex workflows for power users
- [Best Practices](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/best-practices): Guidelines for effective Merobox usage
- [Troubleshooting](https://docs.calimero.network/05-developer-tools/merobox/troubleshooting): Common issues and solutions

## Tutorials

- [Tutorials Overview](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/00-overview): Welcome to Calimero Network tutorials
- [Near Wallet Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/01-login-with-wallets/01-near-wallet): Authenticate users via NEAR wallet
- [Starknet Wallet Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/01-login-with-wallets/02-starknet-wallet): Integrate Starknet wallet authentication
- [ICP Wallet Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/01-login-with-wallets/03-icp-wallet): Internet Identity authentication
- [Ethereum Wallet Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/01-login-with-wallets/04-ethereum-wallet): Ethereum wallet authentication
- [Create Context](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/02-create-context): Step-by-step guide to creating contexts
- [Invitations and Joinings](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/03-invitations-and-joinings): Context invitation and joining process
- [Key-Value Store Tutorial](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/04-build-app): Build applications using Calimero SDK
- [Publish App](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/05-publish-app): Deploy and publish applications
- [Install Application](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/06-install-application): Install and run applications
- [Python Client Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/08-python-client-integration): Integrating Python client SDK

## Example Projects

- [Only Peers](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-awesome-projects/01-only-peers): Decentralized social networking application
- [Private DAO](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-awesome-projects/02-demo-blockchain-integration): Example connecting to Calimero Proxy Contract
- [Building with ICP](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-awesome-projects/03-building-with-icp): Internet Computer integration tutorial
- [Building with Stellar](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-awesome-projects/04-building-with-stellar): Stellar blockchain integration
- [Building with Ethereum](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-awesome-projects/05-building-with-ethereum): Ethereum blockchain integration
- [Rock Paper Scissors](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-awesome-projects/_03-rock-paper-scissors): Online multiplayer game with enforced rules
- [Blockchain Integration](https://docs.calimero.network/06-tutorials/07-proxy-contract-interaction): Cross-chain interactions through proxy contracts
